body:
Warnings

:warning: Current pr not bind the milestone
:warning: If your PR is about fixing a bug excluding crash the code,you should add the demo link in the PR description. Demo link: http://dotwe.org/vue

Generated by :no_entry_sign: dangerJS against 43a9c09d8cd65d510a0971b42d7ce32f27c44a19
同样的问题，求解
pod集成的WeexSDK，最新版0.28.0还是包含UIWebView的，请问何时更新pod版本？

On weex sdk v0.28, did not reappear.
Please check the weex sdk version in your app
就是更新到0.28才报错啊，在0.19上不会有这个错误
@YorkShen
你都没说清楚遇到了什么问题，怎么个不对法，怎么帮你呀。

> 你都没说清楚遇到了什么问题，怎么个不对法，怎么帮你呀。

实在抱歉, 那会我也搞不清哪里有问题.  命令窗口小没看到报错 现在看到有报错:是 vue 和vue-template-compiler版本不一致.  但是在项目里面修改一样版本没有作用.似乎是在 我 mac 系统的 user/xxx/.wx/下面 这个是 weex 的文件吗?? 需要怎么更改这个
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29719695/77884234-40bd5700-7297-11ea-9dc1-5dd13d104a18.png)

我使用 weex create 创建了一个项目，执行 weex debug src 没有复现你的问题。
你可以尝试删除 /user/xxx/.wx 目录，重新执行命令试试看。

> 我使用 weex create 创建了一个项目，执行 weex debug src 没有复现你的问题。
> 你可以尝试删除 /user/xxx/.wx 目录，重新执行命令试试看。

我估计还得研究研究 你这个方法我也试过了 .wx 这个文件是 weex debug 的时候下载的.  可能是我的环境哪里有问题吧 ...  真让人头大  哈哈哈哈 感谢你的回复

The valid attribute is maxlength.
Related issues #2380 , #3180
有人看看这个问题吗
什么时候能解决啊
同问？

-[WXComponent dealloc] (WXComponent.mm:0)

-[WXComponent .cxx_destruct] (WXComponent.mm:55)

-[WXComponent dealloc] (WXComponent.mm:0)

-[WXComponentManager _runLoopThread] (WXComponentManager.mm:175)
对，多久能升级 去除 uiwebview。不然 app store 不能上了
对，求关注求处理
So in WeeX, how can we make the text do not break into next line?
点击上传文件没得反应 +1
尽管可以自己处理，但还是官方尽快更新，版本不分叉。

Please update the document then, it's confusing.

[english doc](https://weex.apache.org/docs/components/input.html#attributes)
[chinese doc](https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/components/input.html#%E7%AE%80%E4%BB%8B)

TextArea设置line-height无效
--- TextArea dont support the style of line-height.

TextArea在ios手机上弹起遮挡键盘
--- I cant reproduce the issue on my device, do you have any demo?
implement IWXApmMonitorAdapter

> implement IWXApmMonitorAdapter

感谢回复，我做了下尝试，提取了以下这些性能数据：

`{
     "subProcedures": {},
     "stage": {
          "callCreateFinish": 1587475195512,
          "callRenderSuccess": 1587475195527,
          "wxFirstInteractionView": 1587475195489,
          "wxFsRender": 1587475195561,
          "wxRenderTimeOrigin": 1587475195290,
          "wxLoadBundleStartOnJsThread": 1587475195296,
          "wxBeforeInvokeCreateInstanceContext": 1587475195323,
          "wxJSBundleCreateFinish": 1587475195512,
          "wxEndLoadBundle": 1587475195348,
          "wxDestroy": 1587475202728,
          "wxStartLoadBundle": 1587475195295,
          "wxInteraction": 1587475196172,
          "wxNewFsRender": 1587475195848
     },
     "stats": {
          "wxViewCost": 397,
          "wxExecJsCallBack": 0,
          "wxMaxComponentCount": 247,
          "wxScrollerCount": 2,
          "wxFSCallJsTotalNum": 1,
          "wxFSCallNativeTotalTime": 10,
          "wxInteractionScreenViewCount": 37,
          "wxBundleSize": 431.9462890625,
          "wxComponentCost": 59,

          "wxFSCallJsTotalTime": 2,

          "wxImgUnRecycleCount": 11

     },
     "type": "weex_page",
     "event": {}

对这些字段是否有文档解释呢？或者可以参考的注释？

only source code -_-
stage里面的时间戳，都是一些渲染流程点的打点，从renderInternal方法读下去就行了
总感觉半死不活的样子，但是[eeui](https://eeui.app/)做的很好，使得weex变得非常好用
有计划。@YorkShen 在做。
Weex already supports x86_64.  More detailed information #3167 .
安卓手机下，picker.pickDate 选择日期 没有显示确定 取消按钮

Can you help me with steps on how to achieve this. we downloaded weex september last year and we have used it to finish  a project now. We are doing this for the first time
Please what are the exact steps we need to take to upload our app on android :

1)how do we generate keystore for signing the addroid app.

2) how do we configure our weex package to generate the 64bit apk.
我也遇到这个crash了
Does the same problem exist in v0.28.0?

Question 1: You should probably ask Google first. This is the first piece of information obtained from a Google search. https://developer.android.com/studio/publish/app-signing
Question 2: Weex already supports x86_64. But no new version has been released yet. You can integrate from source code or compile it yourself.

please note that i was asking for steps on how to generate keystore for weex apps and also steps on how to generate 64bits app using weex.
Every mobile app framework has specific steps on how to achieve these two actions but so far nobody has helped me to tell me how to do it with weex. this is very disappointing.

please i really need someone who has used weex to build an app on production on google store to please guide me on what to do exactly.
For the Android project, weex is just one of his libraries. So you should learn how the Android project does those things.

please if you dont know the solution to my problems then allow those that know the solution to respond to me.
this is a forum, people come here bc they have problems they cant solve. i wonder why you are telling me to do it myself when i dont know how to do it and you clearly dont know how to do it as well.
what exactly do you mean by integrate from source code or compile it yourself

Please its really unfair for anybody to spend one year on Weex technology to build an app and yet not be able to upload the app on google play store.
we really need help on how to setup keystore for signing the android app. and we also need help on how to convert our 32bits weex apk to a 64bits apk

> @fengqingyun2008 Please give us a PR, thanks.

https://github.com/zhouxuemeng1988/incubator-weex/tree/fix-issues-2957
i find the problem in 0.20.0.2 version, your plan is useless, i do it by keep the theme color

> ## Describe the bug
> weex: idle from create instance cache size is 0
> weex: onRenderError -1001,degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1
> 
> ## To Reproduce
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23181228/79038529-8cafba80-7c0c-11ea-9a2d-30355cc1aef3.png)
> 
> ## Environment
> * Device: [MeiZu 6 Pro]
> * OS: [ 联发科x25 aarch64 arm64-v8a]
> * Version [Android 7.1.1]
>   Weex Version 0.28.0
>   jsc apply from: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/incubator-weex/release/0.28/android/sdk/buildSrc/download_jsc.gradle'
> 
> ## Expected behavior
> start app and white screen
> 
> but in others phone is work,eg:HuaWei aarch64 arm64-v8a
> 
> @YorkShen can you give some help?

@Felix8029 I have the same problem as you. Have you solved this problem?

onRenderError -1001,degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1
```
 ndk {
            abiFilters "x86"
            abiFilters "arm64-v8a"
            abiFilters "armeabi-v7a"
        }
```

```
  implementation 'com.alibaba:fastjson:1.1.46.android'
    implementation 'org.apache.weex:sdk:0.28.0'
```
same bug

> uiwebview 已被苹果弃用，请升级更换到wkwebview
pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'

> 对，多久能升级 去除 uiwebview。不然 app store 不能上了

pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'

> 你好，
> 我看master分支上在三个月前在WXWebComponet中已经使用WKWebView替换掉了UIWebView，而Pod上最新的0.28.0版本仍然使用的是UIWebView，请问何时更新移除UIWebView的版本？

pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'

> Apple will stop accepting submissions of apps that use **UIWebView** APIs,
> so it's time for weex to replace UIWebView.


pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'

> > uiwebview 已被苹果弃用，请升级更换到wkwebview
> > pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'

这样就可以了是吗

> > > uiwebview 已被苹果弃用，请升级更换到wkwebview
> > > pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'
> 
> 这样就可以了是吗

是的，这应该可以解决你的问题了

> > > > uiwebview 已被苹果弃用，请升级更换到wkwebview
> > > > pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'
> > 
> > 
> > 这样就可以了是吗
> 
> 是的，这应该可以解决你的问题了

好像还是不行，我的app是第一次上线，每次打完包交付后就会提示二进制文件无效，我看了一下，还有一个地方使用到uiwebview

> uiwebview

看一下那个文件？ 确定是Weex的问题吗？

> > uiwebview
> 
> 看一下那个文件？ 确定是Weex的问题吗？

按照你的方式pod后，发现只有这个WXPageDomainUtility.m文件里还有用到uiwebview类

> > uiwebview
> 
> 看一下那个文件？ 确定是Weex的问题吗？

我把WXPageDomainUtility.m这个文件的源代码稍微修改了下，然后重新打包交付，就OK了，就是不知道会不会有隐藏问题

> > uiwebview
> 
> 看一下那个文件？ 确定是Weex的问题吗？

抱歉，我看错了，这个文件不是weexsdk的文件，是WXDevtool里的文件
podSpec内的依赖, s.dependency 'WeexSDK'不支持:git =>  。怎么破？

> podSpec内的依赖, s.dependency 'WeexSDK'不支持:git => 。怎么破？

s.dependency 正常依赖 WeexSDK 

podfile 里面用 pod 'WeexSDK' , :git => 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex.git'
然后用的时候，先podinstall 这个
完成后再 install 依赖的库
谢谢，我试下
这种方式访问的是Weex master分支的代码吗

pod 'WeexSDK', :git => 'git@github.com:KorolZhu/incubator-weex.git', :branch => 'ht_0.28.0_wkwebview'

我在0.28.0的基础上修改了WXWebComponent组件，web 组件测试正常，有需要的可以用我这个

pod 'WeexSDK', :git => 'git@github.com:KorolZhu/incubator-weex.git', :branch => 'ht_0.28.0_wkwebview'

我在0.28.0的基础上修改了WXWebComponent组件，web 组件测试正常，有需要的可以用我这个
var storage = weex.requireModule('storage')

What then is the purpose of Weex if I cannot upload the app created with Weex to Google App Store??
Does this mean that we are all wasting our time by using Weex??

I have been here for weeks requesting for help and nobody has responded with a solution.

> Does the same problem exist in v0.28.0?

I don't Konw. We get rid of Weex now.

0.20 版本渲染正常，
0.28.0 weex sdk 是否修改了组件渲染机制

> Does the same problem exist in v0.28.0?

0.28 exist the same problem ,too
@wqyfavor 你好，这个bug 会修复吗

计算误差的问题现在似乎没有什么好办法避免。
对于你图中的使用场景，这个文档应该会对你有帮助 https://weex.apache.org/zh/docs/styles/common-styles.html#flexbox
failed to create ashmem region,是不是这个问题，我也遇到了
You can use `weex` instead of `window` . Or use [storage](https://weex.apache.org/docs/modules/storage.html).

> storage

you mean, `weex.__coverage__` and `storage.__coverage__` ?
上层加个事件响应方法就好了，方法内不写逻辑

ni shi chinese?直接用中文

And you?

你现在还是白屏吗？weex应该都是我们自己人在用吧！
白屏我遇到过很多问题，主要还是代码有问题，所以还是直接吧完整的代码贴出来，好一点

> 同报错啊，onRenderError -1001,degradeToH5|createInstance fail|wx_create_instance_error isJSFrameworkInit==false reInitCount == 1，，，，求解决方案啊

我加了 android:extractNativeLibs="true" 之后运行正常，不知道能不能解决你的问题。
@yangshengtao 你别开离线模式啊

要是我没记错的话，组件编译完也是 js 。 
也没有哪说 JS Service 里只能放函数呀，你肯定是被示例带歪了。
@cnryb 感谢！
你可以使用原生单位计算，不经过基于750的缩放，使用`wx`代替`px`，我已经实践过，详见文档最后，https://weex.apache.org/zh/guide/advanced/multi-size-screen.html#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%9C%BA%E6%99%AF
